dataStudio.name: Covid-19 connector
dataStudio.description: Covid-19 connector imports covid-data from covid19api. It provides information how many cases (Active, Confirmed, Recovered, Deaths) were registered from around 250 locations. Connector is based on a free plan ofÂ covid19api which has limitations. Some locations have no data (i.e.Niue). One country: USA has a response which can't be fetched properly based on a free plan.
dataStudio.shortDescription: Import covid-19 data into Data Studio from covid19api.com
